title: Drawing, "Four Statues in Egyptian Style", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and ink, brush with sepia wash over cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: bassalto. Inscribed under two last figures: marmo nero.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Two male, two female figures. Inscribed: bassalto. Inscribed under two last figures: marmo nero.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Four Statues in Egyptian Style", ca. 1820.
